LanguageData.Bear_Grizzly.description: Huge omnivorous mammals adapted for cold climates. Their thick blubber and fur keep them warm in winter.\n\nWhile their usual diet consists of fish, berries, honey, and scavenged 고기, the grizzly is capable of using its massive strength and deadly 발톱 to kill live prey. They are startlingly quick for such lumbering creatures.
LanguageData.Bear_Polar.label: 북극곰
LanguageData.Corpse_Bear_Polar.label: 북극곰 시체
LanguageData.Bear_Polar.description: A great white bear that lives in the far north. Their thick blubber and fur keep them warm in winter.\n\nWhile their usual diet consists of fish and scavenged 고기, the polar bear is more than capable of using its massive strength and deadly 발톱 to kill live prey. They are startlingly quick for such lumbering creatures.

LanguageData.PandaBear.description: The giant 판다 -black and white cat-foot, also known as 판다 bear or simply 판다, is a bear. It is easily recognized by the large, distinctive black patches around its eyes, over the ears, and across its round body. Giant 판다s in the wild will occasionally eat other grasses, wild tubers, or even 고기 in the form of birds, rodents or carrion.
